TopicTitle: Suggestion: Add "Aim Camera" option when right clicking a specific part of your craft during flight.

Articles.Content: In KSP1, we were able to focus the camera on literally any part of our craft by right clicking it and selecting "Aim Camera". Current camera system on KSP2 seems to be quite on the works still, so I wanted to suggest this for the future. I personally was a user that used this function so much during my missions and it allows for so much versatility that I can't imagine my KSP2 life without it
Yes please!  I also used this a lot in KSP1.
